text: Radhachakram is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P Jaisingh, starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Abhilasha in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Abhilasha * Jagathy Sreekumar * Sreenivasan * Jagannadha Varma * Kuthiravattam Pappu * Shivaji * VK Sreeraman * Alex * Kavara Sasankan * Devika ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Radhachakram
